bill.title: MS Athletic Commission; revise use of fees received by commission from certain distinctive license tag purchases.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 27-19-56.190, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That The Additional Fee That Is Distributed To The Mississippi Athletic Commission From The Purchase Of The Distinctive License Tag In Support Of Boxing May Be Utilized By The Commission For Its Official Use Instead Of For The Payment Of Certain Travel Expenses For Amateur Boxing Athletes Attending Boxing Events; To Amend Section 75-75-119, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That The Commission Shall Fine Any Individual Who Violates Any Rule Or Regulation Passed Or Adopted By The Commission; And For Related Purposes.
